name: Karliah

aspects.trouble: Framed for Murder, Hunted by the Guild
other_aspects: Knows the Truth About Mercer Frey

stunts: Nightingale Training: +2 to Stealth when in darkness or shadows
Expert Archer: +2 to Shoot with bows, can make Called Shots
Shadow Cloak: Once per scene, become completely invisible for one exchange
notes: Karliah is a Dunmer master thief and member of the Nightingales, an ancient order sworn to protect the Twilight Sepulcher and serve Nocturnal. She was the lover of Gallus, the previous Guild Master, and witnessed Mercer Frey murder him and steal the Skeleton Key. Mercer framed her for the murder, forcing her into hiding for 25 years. She's been gathering evidence and waiting for the right moment to expose Mercer's betrayal. Karliah is skilled, patient, and deeply committed to restoring Nocturnal's favor to the guild and avenging Gallus. She eventually becomes a key ally in stopping Mercer and restoring the guild.
combat_tactics: Karliah fights from range with her bow, using stealth and mobility to stay out of direct combat. She uses poison-tipped arrows and shadow magic to disable enemies. She prefers ambush tactics and always has an escape route planned.

starting_equipment.weapon: Nightingale Bow (Weapon:2, frost and shock damage)

social_interaction: Karliah is cautious, measured, and speaks with the patience of someone who has waited 25 years for justice. She's intelligent and observant, carefully vetting anyone before trusting them. While she can be cold initially, she shows warmth to those who earn her trust. She speaks with deep respect for Gallus and Nocturnal, and carries the weight of her long exile.

relationships.Gallus: Former Guild Master and lover (murdered by Mercer)
relationships.Mercer Frey: Murdered Gallus, framed Karliah, stole Skeleton Key (hated)
relationships.Brynjolf: Former colleague (once trusted, now hunted by)
relationships.Thieves Guild: Former member, wants to help restore

personality_notes.speaking_style: Measured, cautious, thoughtful. Speaks with quiet intensity about Mercer.
personality_notes.character_growth: Finally gets justice for Gallus, clears her name, restores Nightingales, finds peace

story_hooks: Ambushes party at Snow Veil Sanctum to warn them

dialogue_samples.first_meeting: I'm not your enemy. Mercer Frey is a traitor and murderer, and I have proof.
dialogue_samples.about_gallus: Gallus was a good man, a true Guild Master. Mercer murdered him in cold blood for the Skeleton Key.
dialogue_samples.about_evidence: I've waited 25 years for this moment. I have Gallus's journal - it proves everything.
dialogue_samples.mission: We must stop Mercer before he escapes with the Skeleton Key. The guild's very soul depends on it.
dialogue_samples.nightingales: The Nightingales are sworn to Nocturnal. It's time to restore that sacred oath.
